item.title: Building a Secure & Compliant Cloud-Based Data Lake: Best practices for protecting stored data
item.category: "data lake" , "cloud security" , "compliance regulations" , "access controls" , "encryption" , "AWS" , "Azure" , "HIPAA" , "GDPR" , "monitoring" , "patching" , "cybersecurity" , "SIEM solution" , "IT support teams" , "threat landscape" , "cloud migration" , "cloud governance"
item.description: Learn about security and compliance best practices when planning, building and managing cloud-based data lakes in this comprehensive guide.
